thread.title: Fame-seeking teenage hacker who crashed FBI website avoids jail - Ealing Times
thread.title_full: Fame-seeking teenage hacker who crashed FBI website avoids jail - Ealing Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Ealing Times
title: Fame-seeking teenage hacker who crashed FBI website avoids jail - Ealing Times
text:
Charlton Floate's actions cost the Government A 15,000 and temporarily halted the reporting of internet crime in the US during targeted attacks masterminded from his family home in Solihull, West Midlands. A judge said Floate played the "central role" in planning, recruiting for and launching damaging cyber assaults and "craving recognition" then boasted online of his success.
 Ealing Times.
